Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Holland
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Ashland, 51st, Damen and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Holland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Ashland, 51st, Damen and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Holland.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near North/Clybourn. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near North/Clybourn.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
